basic.description:
Advanced seminar/workshop in an area of film or video production, generally involving intensive analysis of existing work and practical assignments.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (36L;24Lb;60P)
basic.subject: FILM
basic.title: Production: Special Topic I

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite    Level 4 and reg in a FILM major,or med or COCA or STSC Spec. Plan and (a GPA of 2.6 in FILM) and (18.0 units in FILM).
